name: Refusal of refund value payment for a deposit beverage container
text:
Redemption centers shall refuse to pay the refund value on any broken, corroded, dismembered, flattened deposit beverage container, or any deposit beverage container which:



	(1)	Contains a free flowing liquid;
	(2)	Does not properly indicate a refund value; or
	(3)	Contains a significant amount of foreign material. [L 2002, c 176, pt of §2]
